name: Megan Richardson
text: This is usually our go to pizza place. Last year I had to leave a bad review after consistently getting really late deliveries. The owner made it right and we have yet to have a late pizza since. But after tonight I think we are done. I ‚Ä¶More

name: S G810
text: Pizza was quite tasty. We ordered the green Chile sauce and thin crust. It was amazing in terms of flavour. There is a lot of parking and the location is relatively clean. ‚Ä¶More

text:

name: Alex Grant
text: This place is amazing. The food is on point, and you can order directly from them instead of a 3rd party service. I highly recommend the salads, wings, and any pizza

name: Kagami Sonar
text: I normally love blackjack pizza. My order I just made my pizza came out good yet my mother's she ordered thin crust yet it looks like it was cooked too long and feels very hard and not a good pizza I hope next time is better

name: Chris Ambrosio
text: I made an online order, it was delivered faster than estimated. Sadly the order was the wrong order, I called the store, the manager quickly fixed the problem and had my order delivered in minutes! Great customer service, took care of us and made sure we had dinner.

name: cujogreen
text: Way better than the hut. Square pan Good Deal is my favorite!

name: Marlon Case
text: I constantly stop getting some food in this spot. I love the quick service and well cooked dishes. Great work.

name: Lydia Giovanini
text: The best pizza and wings in town. The food is always delicious and the customer service is great!

name: Sandra Hammons
text: It's open only for take out, in this health crisis. However the service was friendly and the pizza was fresh and delicious!

name: Daniel Raizman
text: Great pizza at a great price. Probably the best delivery option around.

name: Edward Densmore
text: I tried this place already with my friend and I am obsessed since then. I enjoyed the awesome ambience and delightful food and drinks. Keep it up.

name: Daniel Murphy
text: Clean nice and real

name: Tina Chen
text: Crispy and delicious! The meat and mushrooms are delicious. Especially the chili üå∂ Ô∏è!

name: Nathalie Klopfenstein
text: First time trying out this pizza and cinnamon sticks. They were both delicious! Very fresh ingredients, and when I picked them up, they asked if I wanted a bit more frosting on the cinnamon sticks. They had a good amount, but a little more is always welcome, lol!! Will definitely be back!

text:

text: Absolutely the worst customer service I‚Äôve ever encountered. Took over an hour for them to even leave the store. Then the driver calls me up and says he‚Äôs going to be another 20 to 30 minutes. I asked him if the pizza was cold and he ‚Ä¶More

name: Ian
text: Quick service, classic black jack style pizza. Highly recommend

name: Darrell Sibley
text: Fast fresh delivery what more could you want. Even if they raised the prices I'd still give the place my business because you don't pay for cold food and I feel like they realize this here. Get it out the oven and rush your butt here! Thanks guys! Keep up the great work!

name: caroline rone
text: Super good varieties

name: x j
text: I used to come here once or twice a week as of now. Always get the same thing, salad and garlic and one pound of wings, two sodas, and two ice cream.  Came in tonight and it took the girl three times to get the food each time she kept ‚Ä¶More

name: Chris Gutierrez
text: Not bad. Pretty fast delivery also! Forgot my ranch side but other than that pretty good pizza.

name: Shandel Delmare
text: I never post reviews unless I am just highly disappointed with service and today is one of these times. I placed my order with the estimated time for 90 minutes, which I took in consideration when placed my order so I knew someone would be ‚Ä¶More

name: Luann Chavez
text: We had an order that stated would be delivered in around 35 minutes , we called at 50 minutes to see where our order was, said it was already on the road. We were only 2 miles away. Arrived 95 minutes after the call. And cold, glad I kept the $5 tip.

name: Garrett Pearson
text: I like to order the cheesy bread. That's where it's at. it's way better than the pizza. Calzones are also good. I ordered the bread last night with chicken and feta. OMG heaven!! But then I fell asleep and forgot to put it away. I woke up ‚Ä¶More

name: James Sondag
text: This is our favorite Delivery pizza place in the area.  Their square pan pizzas are our favorite.  The team making these pies are always super effecient and friendly too.  We really like this place.

name: dexjm17
text: Better than the other pizza places I Broomfield

name: R R
text: Wow. Most of the time great! Sometimes they forget stuff, just call they'll refund your order. Pan pizza rocks, good ranch, good chicken, good personal salads. Thin crust is nice and crispy, not usually greasy pizza. Frequent cust here

name: Chris McMahon
text: Good food hot fresh and a nice new location

name: TF TV
text: Everything was perfect! Great looking and tasting pizza and salad. Smelled awesome in the store and was very clean. Highly recommend this place.

name: Tiffany Blair
text: I love Blackjack pizza! Tonight I witnessed their expert customer service. The delivery driver missed my salad on our order. Without hesitant went back to the facility and quickly came back with it. She was kind and apologetic. My salad was delicious!

name: Macie K
text: Best pizza!

name: kathleen belloso
text: Amazing I had a great experience tonight I went in and was greeted as soon as I stepped in. Service was fast and friendly the mood in the restaurant was amazing I felt very welcomed! Thankyou for this amazing experience pizza was delicious I will be coming back soon!

name: Jeremy Hays
text: Waited an hour and a half before calling because I've worked pizza, I know how it is. Especially on Halloween. But they didn't even know I ordered(online order) get your act together.

name: Keith Lommatsch
text: Blackjack Pizza is the best pizza chain in my opinion. Their new location is sleek and efficient. Went to Little Caesars "hot and ready" and was told there was a 30 to 40 minute wait. Blackjack is a little out of the way, but the pizza is much better and you don't have to wait.

name: Bill Lee
text: Great food super fast

name: Antoinette Gonzales
text: Good pizza, clean establishment helpful staff we buy regularly from their

name: Dave Wilson
text: Had it for the 1st time tonight.  Honestly one of the best pizzas I've had.  Highly recommend the deep dish "square" pizza. We had Hawaiian with extra sauce and it was amazing!

name: James Miskiewicz
text: The best delivery pizza around here that I've tried. Comprehensive online ordering, tons of customization options and great salads.

name: john mclucas
text: Extremely poor customer service in a world where there are many many options for pizza. ‚Ä¶More

name: keith blackburn
text: Great wood fire pizza right next to my hotel price is great for what you get

name: J ROD
text: Was easy to place an order through their deals page on their website. Coupons get added automatically and the pricing is reasonable since you can tell the ingredients are fresh. Pizza was hot even though it was Friday at lunch time. ‚Ä¶More

name: Christian B
text: Usually when a company wants to promote the opening of a new store they will send out coupons to give the general public in that area a taste of their new location. I usually will take them up on their offer and try them out. But this offer ‚Ä¶More

name: Karma
text: This Blackjack is AWESOME! Our order was delievered before the hour time it gave and the food was sooo HOT amd FRESH! The driver was so pleasent and friendly especially with how cold it is! Thanks for being so wonderful and keep up the great work! You can tell you guys work hard and enjoy what you do!

name: Jeremiah Mahan
text: Always great pizza!

name: David Stratman
text: The new location is great!

name: Austin K
text: Delivery took 30 minutes when the estimate was 60, the pizza was hot, fresh, and had a good amount of toppings. Really impressed.

name: Shannon Listy
text: Was told 20 minutes for our pizza to be ready it took  45. They didn't seem to care. No refund, no money off for their lack of slowness. I will be finding a new pizza place. Their quality and service has been going down hill for a while.

name: Casey O'Mara
text: Fairly quick delivery, it took about 35 minutes to arrive and we live a few miles away from here. The pizza was delicious, I'd recommend getting the square pizza. The boneless wings were fairly good for the price, but I think I might pass on them next time.

name: Michael Steinacher
text: Enjoyed my Calzone.I and salad! Very good. Staff was extremely helpful and positive. Very dedicated group of people. Food was very tasty and filling. Really a Calzone.I with a salad could feed two people.

name: john beach
text: Seth was very helpful tonight. .my family appreciates his efforts .

name: Michael Parrish
text: I have never had a problem with the old location. Hopefully they took all of their employees to the new store. Great food great customer service and fast and friendly drivers

name: Kelly McCann
text: It was good and the order was correct

name: K
text: Great salads when I'm too lazy to make them and my hubby loves the cheesy bread. Had issues in the past but they have gone above and beyond to correct them.

name: Julia C
text: Best pizza in town its fast, hot, and fresh.

name: Tacha Gonzalez
text: Pizza is great but the salads are where it's at. Hands down the best delivery place for salads. AND the calzones are amazing too!

name: whytpantha milehigh
text: Love the customer service here. Their chicken bacon ranch pizza is to die for. Will always come back!!

name: Erin Wilson
text: Always at least 15min later than estimated. 1 sausage per slice. Stingy on all the toppings.  2 salads have had brown lettuce.  Serious quality issues with this black jack.

name: Turd Burglar
text: Nobody know what they are doing every time I've called I've been denied the takeout discount forcing me to go to the louisvill store I'm not paying 10.00 for a one topping pizza. The store is new and it looks nice inside but the workers make this place below average for a pizza place. This place doesn't deserve to be in Broomfeild.

name: Jeff Stenberg
text: Been going here for a while now and have no bad experiences to date.  This location is clean and recently renovated and has a great staff.

name: Niki Wagner
text: 5 stars, I love this store! AWSOME food, deep dish bread with toppings, surpasses- yummy! Fast, nice, great experiences, my family is hooked.

name: Jake Terpstra
text: I haven't had Blackjack in 10+ years, and it was absolutely worth re-trying. My fianc√© and I were looking for someplace that had calzones and delivered and Blackjack was the only restaurant that did both. We were so satisfied with the pizza ‚Ä¶More

name: Novel Guitar Child
text: Good pizza

name: Chris Murphy
text: Always go in and pick it up and pizza is always ready when we get there. Great pizza.

name: Naked Singularity
text: Great Pizza with the best taste of all the competition, imho. Although I see other say they‚Äôve had slow delivery, I always get fast delivery (and I‚Äôve ordered from BJ hundreds of times over many, many years) and the pizza is always consistently great quality.

name: Kristy B.
text: Had a really bad experience and posted my review.  Staff was very rude and food was disgusting....got a call....took review off...gave them another shot....I'm pretty sure they just purposely gave my family and I the worst pizza ‚Ä¶More

text: Good pizza

text: Fast delivery, great pizza, love the gluten free options, friendly staff.

name: David Ellis

text: The Best Pizza in Broomfield! Superfast delivery, super nice driver, and absolutely delicious pizza :) A+

text: Not quite as good as other blackjacks in the area, delivery times at peak hours are 1-1.5 hours or 15 minutes if we pick it up. ‚Ä¶More

name: James Trost
text: No idea how the pizza is.  Called 3 times.  Was rudely put on hold 3 times.  Waited about 10 minutes a time.  Googled papa johns... and now their pizza is on the way.
